name: The legend of Billy ( Beta ) EN
name_original: The legend of Billy ( Beta ) EN
description:
French : https://crakicuri.itch.io/the-legend-of-billy


Let us tell you the legend of Billy, a young man, alone and frightened, who must warn the world about a new threat.

To accomplish his virtuous quest, our hero will use powerful hearts of energy to build mechanical friends.

His adventure will lead him to his old village and, filled with memories, he will have to reach the giant sleeping tower he sees in the distance.


In this puzzle game, you play as Billy, a young engineer who must recycle spare parts to build robots.

You will have to use the abilities of your new friends to travel through a landscape ruined by corrupted automata.

The game is in BETA and still has many bugs. We are working every day to improve your experience.

Here is the list of additions and changes that will come in the following days:

  • A story told in the form of animated illustrations.
  • Long end-of-game cutscene.
  • Robot animations.
  • Ambient sounds.
  • Even more balancing.

You can fill out a questionnaire to help us improving the game by clicking on the following link:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfExEdubQvAVt_tSGWCivZEKC8owTmXVLdGz6VoBYyUstQggQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

This is a school project made for the end of our second year of game design studies at ETPA in Toulouse (France).

It will be evaluated on June 1, 2020 and must answer the following subject:

"Make a Zelda-type game on the theme of recycling.

The objective is to educate a teenage audience on the ecological impact by encouraging eco-responsible behavior. "

The final game will be on smartphones, but for now we offer a Windows version to make it more accessible.
